short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that changes all of the measurement to grams (cups, tsp, tablespoons, ounce and grams).Happy and easy cooking!!!.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension transfers many cooking and baking measurements to grams, which is considered by many the most professional way to measure ,also it is easier and simpler to just weight everything instead of struggle with finding a specific cup or tablespoon etc.
